script.name: Menu.Anarkis.Pirate.Comm.Ship.SM
script.description: Menu: Pirate Guild - Comm : Ships - Set Menu

line.comment: * Put values, like value switch values and other init here
* The following commented block is for performance sensitive menus. Uncommenting calls the menu control write refresh only when UI control is manipulated.
* set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=25 lines
* - Ask a pilot what he is doing
*$text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=415, null, null, null, null, null
*add custom dynamic menu item to array $Menu: text=$text return value='escort'
* Build a menu for angry guild members
* The ship don't want to talk - busy mode
* The ship don't want to talk

sval.val: Menu: Pirate Guild - Comm : Ships - Set Menu
Put values, like value switch values and other init here
The following commented block is for performance sensitive menus. Uncommenting calls the menu control write refresh only when UI control is manipulated.
set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=25 lines
- Ask a pilot what he is doing
$text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=415, null, null, null, null, null
add custom dynamic menu item to array $Menu: text=$text return value='escort'
Build a menu for angry guild members
The ship don't want to talk - busy mode
The ship don't want to talk
